title: NIAB Notification 2026 - Apply Online for Technical Assistant Posts
description: The National Institute of Animal Biotechnology (NIAB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Technical Assistant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, Post-graduation can apply for the NIAB Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection...
